title: Birthday buns
ingredients: ['4 eggs', 'butter, softened', 'caster sugar', 'a few drops vanilla extract (optional)', 'self-raising flour', 'cocoa powder (if you want chocolate fairy cakes)', 'A pinch salt', 'For the icing', '100g dark chocolate, broken into pieces', '100g milk chocolate, broken into pieces', '75g butter, cubed', 'To decorate', '3 tablespoons hundreds and thousands or coloured sprinkles']
